videos.title: Waveform (2015)
videos.additional_info:
Waveform (2015)
Short film directed by Stefan Nadelman, featuring an array of duplication techniques. You're seeing a kaleidescope-like effect where the footage has been duplicated and mirrored — akin to peering into a kaleidescope.
Technique - Kaleidoscope
Director - Stefan Nadelman
Original Source - Link

videos.title: Kevin McGloughlin for Max Cooper 'Repetition' (2019)
videos.description: 'Repetition' is an attempt to convey the importance of our endless endeavours toward human development and growth amidst a chaotic and disorienting landscape. The struggle for a fruitful future is challenging with the distractions of everyday life alongside its ever-growing technological 'advancements'. The hope is for humanity to strive through all of this in a meaningful and positive way.
videos.additional_info:
Kevin McGloughlin for Max Cooper 'Repetition' (2019)

The hope is for humanity to strive through all of this in a meaningful and positive way.
Technique - Kaleidoscope , Object Duplication
Director - Kevin McGloughlin

videos.title: Bree Runway - Just Like That (2024)
videos.description: The "Just Like That" music video by Bree Runway is a vibrant and high-energy visual feast that showcases her bold fashion choices and dynamic choreography. Set against a variety of colorful backdrops, the video emphasizes Bree's confident persona and eclectic style, further establishing her as a rising star in the music industry.
videos.additional_info:

Set against a variety of colorful backdrops, the video emphasizes Bree's confident persona and eclectic style, further establishing her as a rising star in the music industry.

Director - Pietro Biz Biasia
DOP - Chaimuki
Colorist - Jon Dobson
